Reviews.Title: Good product...quick delivery
Reviews.Author: Annie007
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 3gs was ordered and delivered in ample time. It is a pretty good and reliable phone. I prefer this by far over the Blackberry. The only major problem I have so far with the iPhone 3gs is the battery life. I don't usually run many applications or do much downloading on a regular basis, but I have to charge the phone every single night. Ughhh! There is suppose to be a pin like object to open the simcard slot, that pin was pissing and one other problem, which is a defect with this particular phone, is that there seems to be some heated pixels to the top right-hand corner of the screen. Whenever i take pictures etc, the picture has this black dis-colouration about the size of a penny on it. That is the major disappointment with this phone, because it is suppose to be a BRAND NEW phone! Other than that and the battery life its a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone have problem inside...
Reviews.Author: Bacho
Reviews.Content: I have bought refurbished one and visual of that phone is normal. However, while  shaking the phone I hearing some voice inside it…. I guessed some detail is not installed..Never buy refurbished iPhone!

Reviews.Title: Ordered 3GS, got 3G with non original plastic cover
Reviews.Author: I. Twig
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my nephew that lives overseas.  You can not imagine how disappointed he was when he realized he can not install his favorite apps, because his phone is stuck on iOS4.2.7 and can not upgrade.  (3GS can go up to iOS6.0 and that's why I bought that specific model to him so that he can enjoy his phone...).Very very disappointing, not to mention fraudulent!

Reviews.Title: Not advertised correctly
Reviews.Author: Nenzi Boccuzzi
Reviews.Content: The phone is not unlocked, I can not use it and I want to retun it for a full refund

Reviews.Title: It's Good
Reviews.Author: Harry Benson
Reviews.Content: It's good.  As Advertised.  No Problems. Use as AT & T Go Phone (prepaid) and it's fine.  I am amazed.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: klr
Reviews.Content: Essentially a new phone, came with all accessories, and works great on T-Mobile, as this is an unlocked 'world phone.'

Reviews.Title: NOT COMPATABLE TO VERIZON
Reviews.Author: H. Johnson
Reviews.Content: sent this item back nothing wrong with the phone but the iphone was not compatabie to verizon so i was never really able to ue this phone

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: monkey mom
Reviews.Content: The phone was UNlocked as advertised and worked right out of the box.  Brand new - perfect condition.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: 3GS Apple iPhone
Reviews.Author: vladde9940
Reviews.Content: Super sleek, clear, and GREAT battery life. I have loved my 3G would not trade it for a blackberry. If you are considering "go for it"!!!!

Reviews.Title: Will buy from this seller again
Reviews.Author: Fred Leroy Pemberton Jr.
Reviews.Content: Got the 2 iPhones fast and no problems with phones at all Recomend to several family and friends to get there own iPhones

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: alejandrodoz
Reviews.Content: todo bien tal cual la descripciontodo perfecto como lo describianlo recomiendo.. sigan asi..todo perfecto como lo describianlo recomiendo.. sigan asi.. mejor imposible
